price: 5. Wuxuuse Aadmigu dooni inuu beeniyo waxa ka horreeya (ee sugaya)3.
footnotes: 3. Macnaha waa inuu denbi isaga sii socdo. Waxaana loola jeedaa qofka gaalka ah ee beeniya maalinta xisaabta ee iska wata shirkiga iyo macaasidiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
